mapper.select: select id, dl_number, branchid, customerid, wid, sp_shopid, sp_name, sp_Company, sp_jprice, number, loss_number, zje, sp_Specifications, sp_color, beizhu, ys_dl_number from projects.xtdocument_shop where id = #{id}

select id, dl_number, branchid, customerid, wid, sp_shopid, sp_name, sp_Company, sp_jprice, number, loss_number, zje, sp_Specifications, sp_color, beizhu, ys_dl_number from projects.xtdocument_shop limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into projects.xtdocument_shop(dl_number, branchid, customerid, wid, sp_shopid, sp_name, sp_Company, sp_jprice, number, loss_number, zje, sp_Specifications, sp_color, beizhu, ys_dl_number) values (#{dlNumber}, #{branchid}, #{customerid}, #{wid}, #{spShopid}, #{spName}, #{spCompany}, #{spJprice}, #{number}, #{lossNumber}, #{zje}, #{spSpecifications}, #{spColor}, #{beizhu}, #{ysDlNumber})

insert into projects.xtdocument_shop(id,dl_number, branchid, customerid, wid, sp_shopid, sp_name, sp_Company, sp_jprice, number, loss_number, zje, sp_Specifications, sp_color, beizhu, ys_dl_number) values
(#{entity.id},#{entity.dlNumber}, #{entity.branchid}, #{entity.customerid}, #{entity.wid}, #{entity.spShopid}, #{entity.spName}, #{entity.spCompany}, #{entity.spJprice}, #{entity.number}, #{entity.lossNumber}, #{entity.zje}, #{entity.spSpecifications}, #{entity.spColor}, #{entity.beizhu}, #{entity.ysDlNumber})

insert into projects.xtdocument_shop(dl_number, branchid, customerid, wid, sp_shopid, sp_name, sp_Company, sp_jprice, number, loss_number, zje, sp_Specifications, sp_color, beizhu, ys_dl_number) values
(#{entity.dlNumber}, #{entity.branchid}, #{entity.customerid}, #{entity.wid}, #{entity.spShopid}, #{entity.spName}, #{entity.spCompany}, #{entity.spJprice}, #{entity.number}, #{entity.lossNumber}, #{entity.zje}, #{entity.spSpecifications}, #{entity.spColor}, #{entity.beizhu}, #{entity.ysDlNumber})
on duplicate key update dl_number = values(dl_number) , branchid = values(branchid) , customerid = values(customerid) , wid = values(wid) , sp_shopid = values(sp_shopid) , sp_name = values(sp_name) , sp_Company = values(sp_Company) , sp_jprice = values(sp_jprice) , number = values(number) , loss_number = values(loss_number) , zje = values(zje) , sp_Specifications = values(sp_Specifications) , sp_color = values(sp_color) , beizhu = values(beizhu) , ys_dl_number = values(ys_dl_number)
mapper.update:
update projects.xtdocument_shop
dl_number = #{dlNumber},
branchid = #{branchid},
customerid = #{customerid},
wid = #{wid},
sp_shopid = #{spShopid},
sp_name = #{spName},
sp_Company = #{spCompany},
sp_jprice = #{spJprice},
number = #{number},
loss_number = #{lossNumber},
zje = #{zje},
sp_Specifications = #{spSpecifications},
sp_color = #{spColor},
beizhu = #{beizhu},
ys_dl_number = #{ysDlNumber},
where id = #{id}
